name: seo-content-writer-project
description: AI-powered SEO content writer - Complete project

scripts.install-all: cd seo-content-writer && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../llm-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd llm-service && python app.py" "cd seo-content-writer && npm start"
